Html:
Hi,

Is there any active development on the hunter module or is it on hold?

Yours,

Drizz
Yes, there's development on it. The Hunter dev has been on vacation for 3 weeks and just got back a few days ago.
...and what's the definition of there being development on it.

Finally registered just for this post hehehe ;P

I've been using Rawr since v2.2.0.9, my main is feral dps, and this program is nothing less than incredible.  My hunter is just about 80 now and with the way things are looking, he may become my main (Oh noes, feral traitor! ^_^)  I know there's loads of hunter information out there and Shandara's spreadsheet, but I don't have Excel and OpenOffice doesn't work with many features.  Needless to say I'm VERY eager for Rawr's hunter model.

As people always point out, this isn't anyone's job, but I wanted to let iamcal know I appreciate any updates you've done and many thanks to all past hunter model developers!  I hope you keep it up, man, because I'm actually as excited for the hunter model as I am for Cataclysm!
